name: VLC
description: VLC is a free and open source cross-platform multimedia player and framework that supports most audio and video decoders and file formats. You can also play most multimedia files, DVD, Audio CD, VCD and various streaming agreements by it.

en_US.description: VLC is a free and open source cross-platform multimedia player and framework that supports most audio and video decoders and file formats. You can also play most multimedia files, DVD, Audio CD, VCD and various streaming agreements by it.
en_US.name: VLC

zh_CN.description: VLC是一款自由、开源的跨平台多媒体播放器及框架，它支持大多数的音频与视频解码器及文件格式，还可以播放大多数多媒体文件，以及DVD、音频CD、VCD及各类流媒体协议。
zh_CN.name: VLC
